item.title: 树莓派128G
item.description: 树莓派128G 资料 Home Assistant, (1) 系統安裝與簡單上手 https://gogoprivateryan.blogspot.com/2019/01/home-assistant-1-internet-of-things.html 安装Home Assistant踩过的坑 https://blog.csdn.net/u011738895/article/details/105755512 0.75.3 -> 0.112.4 升级笔记 https://bbs.hassbian.com/thread-10764-1-1.html 官网 https://www.home-assistant.io/ 安装步骤 下载32位镜像文件 https://www.home-assistant.io/hassio/installation/ 下载b
